img_above_text:
![Wukong Turtle 21.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/f/f9/Wukong_Turtle_21.jpg)
Head past the chest to find another trail leading past it, and watch for two Cyan Bats in another small tunnel with a green Wisp, leading to a Tree Pearl to harvest.
img_below_text:
Look for ledges to jump up past the Tree Pearl, and you'll find another section ending in some braziers beside a second **Treasure Chest** with more materials.
![Wukong Turtle 23.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/f/f1/Wukong_Turtle_23.jpg)
summary_promot:
You are shown an image extracted from a video game walkthrough or guide.


        
        Context:
        - Preceding Text: "![Wukong Turtle 21.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/f/f9/Wukong_Turtle_21.jpg)
Head past the chest to find another trail leading past it, and watch for two Cyan Bats in another small tunnel with a green Wisp, leading to a Tree Pearl to harvest."
        - Following Text: "Look for ledges to jump up past the Tree Pearl, and you'll find another section ending in some braziers beside a second **Treasure Chest** with more materials.
![Wukong Turtle 23.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/f/f1/Wukong_Turtle_23.jpg)"

        Your task:
        1. Generate a **short, clear, and informative English summary** of the image.
        2. Focus primarily on the **preceding and following text** to infer the image's **purpose, content, or narrative role**.
        3. Do **not** speculate beyond the visible content.
img_summary: The image shows the player character in a snowy, rocky environment, approaching a trail marked by a red circle. A large urn-like structure and glowing flames are visible nearby, suggesting a point of interest or progression. Based on the preceding and following text, this area leads to a tunnel with Cyan Bats and a green Wisp, eventually culminating in a Tree Pearl and further exploration involving ledges and another treasure chest.
